messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Reminder that setting your suit to tracking makes finding your corpse a lot easier

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: W-We ar-re hirin-ng S-S-Sec-c of-f-ff-f-f-fic-cers, p-p-p-pl-leas-se c-c-com-m-m-me t-t-to t-th-h-h-he H-HOP-P l-line.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Nut Network. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: B-Be on-n look-k-k-kout-t-t-t f-f-f-for-r a head s-s-sl-l-l-lug-g-g-g, kil-l-l-ll-l it-t-t on-n s-s-s-sig-gh-h-ht-t-t

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Counter Intelligence

Cargo: The syndicate are trying to infiltrate your station. If you let them hijack your cargo shuttle, you'll save us a headache.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There are more lings on the station, Russel Merryman is apparently one and just stole Gragnirs DNA

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Transfer Centre.

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body:
Hey, the library is looking for your work!
I need fiction writers, any kind of story will do as long as it is family friendly.
Book donations will also be accepted. ALL works will be accepted.

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">in the abscence of security i am forming a new organisation. The station watch! We act like security, watching out for crime and then we report it, contact me to join.</font>
